Name: Production Date - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for the production of the documented physical object.

Name: Production Date - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for the production of the documented physical object.

Name: Production Location
Description: This field is used to record the place of the production of the documented physical object.

Name: Production Period
Description: This field is used to record the historical period in which the production of the documented physical object occurred.

Name: Destruction Date - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for the destruction of the documented physical object.

Name: Destruction Date - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for the destruction of the documented physical object.

Name: Destruction Location
Description: This field is used to record the place of the destruction of the documented physical object.

Name: Destruction period
Description: This field is used to record the historical period in which the destruction of the documented physical object occurred.

Name: Production - Used Physical Object
Description: This field is used to indicate the specific object used in the process of production of the documented object.

Name: Curation Date - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for curation of the documented collection.

Name: Curation Date - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for the curation of the documented collection.

Name: Curation Location
Description: This field is used to record the location at which the curation of the documented collection occurred.

Name: Curation Period
Description: This field is used to indicate the period during which the curation of the documented collection occurred.

Name: Rules or Conventions Description
Description: This field is used to provide a free text description of the rules or conventions that are adopted in the curation of the documented collection.

Name: Rules or Conventions Type
Description: This field is used to indicate the type of rules or conventions that are adopted in the curation of the documented collection.
